languages.text: "Во-первых, я доверил эту работу ей, и Ее Светлость с ней справляется. А во-вторых... {name}, вы ведь отдаете себе отчет, чем я тут занимаюсь? На данный момент я пытаюсь не дать умереть миллиардам, а вы спрашиваете меня, почему я не спасаю сотни".

"Firstly, I entrusted the task to Her Ladyship, and she is executing it competently. And secondly... {name}, are you unaware of what I am striving to do here? At present, I am trying to prevent the deaths of billions, yet you ask me why I am choosing not to save hundreds."
languages.original_text: "Во-первых, я доверил эту работу ей, и Ее Светлость с ней справляется. А во-вторых... {name}, вы ведь отдаете себе отчет, чем я тут занимаюсь? На данный момент я пытаюсь не дать умереть миллиардам, а вы спрашиваете меня, почему я не спасаю сотни".

traits.locale_text: "Firstly, I entrusted the task to Her Ladyship, and she is executing it well. And secondly... {name}, are you unaware of what I am striving to do here? At present, I am trying to prevent the deaths of billions, yet you ask me why I am choosing not to save hundreds."

"Firstly, I entrusted the task to Her Ladyship, and she is executing it well. And secondly... {name}, are you unaware of what I am striving to do here? At present, I am trying to prevent the deaths of billions, yet you ask me why I am choosing not to save hundreds."

"Firstly, I entrusted the task to Her Ladyship, and she is executing it well. And secondly... {name}, are you unaware of what I am striving to do here? At present, I am trying to prevent the deaths of billions, yet you ask me why I am choosing not to save hundreds."

"Firstly, I entrusted the task to Her Ladyship, and she is executing it competently. And secondly... {name}, are you unaware of what I am striving to do here? At present, I am trying to prevent the deaths of billions, yet you ask me why I am choosing not to save hundreds."

languages.text: “首先，是我把这个任务托付给了她，而她完成得很好。其次……你莫非不明白我在这里做些什么吗，{name}？我正在努力让数十亿人幸免于难，而你却质问我为什么不去拯救几百人，嗯？”
languages.original_text: "Firstly, I entrusted the task to Her Ladyship, and she is executing it competently. And secondly... {name}, are you unaware of what I am striving to do here? At present, I am trying to prevent the deaths of billions, yet you ask me why I am choosing not to save hundreds."

traits.locale_text: “首先，是我把这个任务托付给了她，而她完成得很好。其次……你莫非不明白我在这里做些什么吗，{name}？我正在努力让数十亿人幸免于难，而你却质问我为什么不去拯救几百人，嗯？”

languages.text: «En primer lugar, fui yo quien encomendó esa tarea a milady, que la está ejecutando de forma competente. Y en segundo lugar... {name}, ¿es consciente de lo que intento hacer aquí? Estoy tratando de salvar miles de millones de vidas y usted me pregunta por qué renuncio a salvar unos pocos cientos».
languages.original_text: "Firstly, I entrusted the task to Her Ladyship, and she is executing it competently. And secondly... {name}, are you unaware of what I am striving to do here? At present, I am trying to prevent the deaths of billions, yet you ask me why I am choosing not to save hundreds."

traits.locale_text: «En primer lugar, fui yo quien encomendó esa tarea a milady, que la está ejecutando de forma ejemplar. Y en segundo lugar... {name}, ¿es consciente de lo que intento hacer aquí? Estoy tratando de salvar miles de millones de vidas y usted me pregunta por qué renuncio a salvar unos pocos cientos».

languages.text: 「まず第一に、この任務を陛下に任せたところ、適切に遂行されている。そして第二に…{name}、私がここで為そうとしていることに気づいていないのか？現在、私は何十億人もの死を回避しようとしているのだ。なのに、数百人を救う選択をなぜしないのかとなぜ私に問う？」
languages.original_text: "Firstly, I entrusted the task to Her Ladyship, and she is executing it competently. And secondly... {name}, are you unaware of what I am striving to do here? At present, I am trying to prevent the deaths of billions, yet you ask me why I am choosing not to save hundreds."

traits.locale_text: 「まず第一に、この任務を閣下に任せたところ、きちんと遂行されている。そして第二に…{name}、私がここで為そうとしていることに気づいていないのか？現在、私は何十億人もの死を回避しようとしているのだ。なのに、数百人を救う選択をなぜしないのかとなぜ私に問う？」

languages.text: « Premièrement, j'ai confié cette mission à Sa Seigneurie et elle s'en charge avec brio. Deuxièmement... {name}, ne comprenez-vous pas ce que j'essaie d'accomplir ? Je m'échine actuellement à empêcher la mort de milliards de personnes, et vous me demandez pourquoi je choisis de ne pas en sauver quelques centaines. »
languages.original_text: "Firstly, I entrusted the task to Her Ladyship, and she is executing it competently. And secondly... {name}, are you unaware of what I am striving to do here? At present, I am trying to prevent the deaths of billions, yet you ask me why I am choosing not to save hundreds."

traits.locale_text: « Premièrement, j'ai confié cette mission à Sa Seigneurie et elle s'en charge avec brio. Deuxièmement... {name}, ne comprenez-vous pas ce que j'essaie d'accomplir ? Je m'échine actuellement à empêcher la mort de milliards de personnes, et vous me demandez pourquoi je choisis de ne pas en sauver quelques centaines. »

languages.text: "Erstens habe ich Ihrer Ladyschaft die Aufgabe übertragen, und sie erfüllt sie sehr kompetent. Und zweitens ... {name}, seid Ihr Euch nicht im Klaren, was ich hier zu tun versuche? Ich will aktuell den Tod von Milliarden verhindern, und Ihr fragt, warum ich Hunderte nicht rette."
languages.original_text: "Firstly, I entrusted the task to Her Ladyship, and she is executing it competently. And secondly... {name}, are you unaware of what I am striving to do here? At present, I am trying to prevent the deaths of billions, yet you ask me why I am choosing not to save hundreds."

traits.locale_text: "Erstens habe ich Ihrer Ladyschaft die Aufgabe übertragen, und sie erfüllt sie gut. Und zweitens ... {name}, seid Ihr Euch nicht im Klaren, was ich hier zu tun versuche? Ich will aktuell den Tod von Milliarden verhindern, und Ihr fragt, warum ich Hunderte nicht rette."
